name: FitForge - Forge Your Fitness Journey
description: A fitness tracking website that enables users to log workouts, track progress, and stay motivated on their fitness journey.

features.title: User Authentication
features.description: Secure login and registration via Email/Password or Google Sign-In.

features.title: User Role Management
features.description: Users are assigned roles as Regular Users, Trainers, or Admins, each with specific permissions and functionalities.

features.title: Class Booking via Packages
features.description: Users must purchase a package (Basic, Standard, or Premium) to book training sessions, powered by secure Stripe payments.

features.title: User Features
features.description: Book sessions with trainers, track activity logs, apply to become a trainer, leave reviews, and engage in forums.

features.title: Trainer Features
features.description: Manage class slots, schedule sessions, and create forum discussions for fitness guidance.

features.title: Admin Features
features.description: Oversee class and forum management, review trainer applications, manage trainers, subscribers, and platform balance.

features.title: Forum Voting System
features.description: Users can like or dislike forum posts to enhance engagement and promote valuable discussions.

features.title: Responsive Design
features.description: Optimized for all devices with a clean and intuitive user interface for seamless navigation.

features.title: Enhanced User Experience
features.description: Smooth navigation with animations, tooltips, and real-time updates for an engaging platform experience.

challenges.title: Implementing Stripe Payment Gateway
challenges.description: Integrating Stripe for secure and seamless payment processing while ensuring smooth package-based class booking.

challenges.title: User Role & API Security
challenges.description: Implementing distinct user roles (User, Trainer, Admin) with proper authentication and authorization in the backend API to maintain data security.

challenges.title: Responsive & User-Friendly Design
challenges.description: Ensuring a fully responsive, intuitive, and accessible design for seamless user experience across all devices.

futurePlans.title: AI-Powered Recommendations
futurePlans.description: Implementing AI-powered workout recommendations based on user progress and preferences.

futurePlans.title: Social Features
futurePlans.description: Adding social features such as friend connections, group challenges, and leaderboards.

futurePlans.title: Group Workouts
futurePlans.description: Enabling users to join or create group workout sessions for a more engaging and collaborative fitness experience.

futurePlans.title: Detailed User Profiles
futurePlans.description: Providing each user with a detailed profile showcasing their progress, achievements, favorite workouts, and training history.

futurePlans.title: Live Trainer Sessions
futurePlans.description: Introducing live one-on-one or group training sessions with trainers for real-time coaching and feedback.

name: Artifact Hub - Explore Timeless Treasures
description: A digital platform for history enthusiasts to discover, learn, and share knowledge about historical artifacts from different eras.

features.title: User Authentication
features.description: Secure login and registration via Email/Password or Google Sign-In with Firebase.

features.title: Artifact Management
features.description: Add, update, and delete artifacts with form validation and real-time updates.

features.title: Artifact Details
features.description: View comprehensive information about each artifact, including historical context and discovery details.

features.title: Like Artifacts
features.description: Toggle like functionality to express interest in artifacts and track liked items.

features.title: Search and Filter
features.description: Search artifacts by name and filter results dynamically.

features.title: Real-Time CRUD Operations
features.description: Manage artifacts with MongoDB and receive real-time notifications for all actions.

features.title: Protected Routes
features.description: Restricts access to private pages, ensuring only authorized users can manage artifacts.

features.title: Responsive Design
features.description: Optimized for all devices with a clean and intuitive user interface.

features.title: Enhanced User Experience
features.description: Smooth navigation with animations and tooltips for improved interactivity.

challenges.title: Organizing Historical Data
challenges.description: Managing large amounts of historical data while maintaining an intuitive user interface.

challenges.title: Like Toggle Functionality
challenges.description: Implementing a toggle-like feature that updates the database in real-time.

challenges.title: Search and Filter
challenges.description: Developing efficient search and filtering for artifacts.

futurePlans.title: Interactive 3D Views
futurePlans.description: Adding interactive 3D views of artifacts for a more immersive experience.

futurePlans.title: Discussion Forum
futurePlans.description: Creating a discussion forum for history enthusiasts to share knowledge and insights.

futurePlans.title: Multi-Language Support
futurePlans.description: Enabling multi-language functionality to cater to a global audience.

features.title: Enhanced User Experience
